p: To get further information and for further analysis, the crude extract was purified and fractionated via flash chromatography. Sample 1 as well as sample 2 show the same spot pattern according to TLC analysis. Therefore, sample 1 and 2 were unified and concentrated. Sample 3 resulted in the clearest spot and was therefore regarded as being the purest fraction of the main product and, consequently, was used for NMR analysis.
